entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
